Replace.Text: Heaven and man are one, and the Tao is natural
秦始皇治下工匠获得神灵的启示，建立神启工坊，获得大量住房、食物和生产力加成，同时广纳贤才，奇人异士纷纷携带金银异宝来投。

Under the rule of Emperor Qin Shihuang, craftsmen obtained the Enlightenment of the gods, established Shenqi workshops, and obtained a large number of housing, food and productivity bonuses. At the same time, talents were recruited, and strange people and scholars came to invest one after another.
